column4: i cant find synpatic package manager in ubutnu how to install it?
i cant find it in system preferences
Alright, well, you can make sure its installed with: sudo apt-get install synaptic
wont synpatic package manager is visible if im in user mode?
dr_willis:i m amanulla i have created new usr as u said
now im in new usr mode
Ah.  That'd do it, yeah.  non-admin users cannot use synaptic.
As a non-admin user, you can't use sudo either.
